scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-jekyll
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules _sass --source-map true --output css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace css/**/*.css && postcss --map false --use cssnano --dir css/minified css/**/*.css
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css js *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
